sentences.english: The glycemic index ranks foods based on how much they raise blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 血糖指數衡量食物提升血糖的速度。

sentences.english: The glycemic index ranks foods based on how much they raise blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 血糖指數衡量食物提升血糖的速度。

sentences.english: Differential effects of honey, sucrose, and fructose on blood sugar levels(Shambaugh et al. , 1990)
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜜，蔗糖，果糖對血糖水平的影響。

sentences.english: You can also check your blood glucose before you eat a snack or meal.
sentences.chinese: 當然在加餐或喫飯之前，你也可以檢測你的血糖水平。

sentences.english: Low-Glycemic-index vegetables are allowed as well as low-fat cheese, nuts, eggs.
sentences.chinese: 低血糖指數的蔬菜被允許以及低脂奶酪，堅果，雞蛋。

sentences.english: Tea polysaccharide is a kind of acid mucopolysaccharide, has the significant effect on reducing blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 茶葉多糖是一種酸性粘多糖，具有顯著降血糖效果。

sentences.english: Diabetes mellitus is a group of diseases characterized by high levels of blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: “糖尿病”是一類表現爲高血糖的病症的統稱。

sentences.english: Most children were not allowed to check blood glucose levels or administer insulin in class.
sentences.chinese: 大多數兒童不允許在班級監測血糖值及注射胰島素。

sentences.english: The death group has higher blood glucose level than the survival group.
sentences.chinese: 死亡組較存活組應激性血糖濃度高。

sentences.english: Protect your gums by keeping blood sugar levels as close to normal as possible.
sentences.chinese: 要保護你的牙齦，就控制你的血糖接近平常水平。

sentences.english: High blood sugar produces unstable forms of oxygen called free radicals.
sentences.chinese: 高血糖會產生不穩定的氧叫做非常自由氧。

sentences.english: Improving saccharometabolism, reducing blood sugar, preventing and curing diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 改善糖類代謝，降血糖，防治糖尿病。

sentences.english: Our blood-sugar was falling so low that we frequently stumbled as we fought through the sucking mud.
sentences.chinese: 我們的血糖降得很低以致於我們不斷在泥濘中跌倒。

sentences.english: Healthy eating helps to reduce your blood sugar.
sentences.chinese: 健康口腹能幫忙減低血糖。

sentences.english: Sweet potatoes look like the pancreas and actually balance the glycemic index of diabetics.
sentences.chinese: 地瓜形狀像胰腺，可以調節糖尿病患者的血糖指數。

sentences.english: The hyperglycemic effect could be eliminated by bilateral splanchnicotomy.
sentences.chinese: 切除雙側內臟大神經可消除嗎啡的高血糖效應。

definition: see 郎格罕氏島|郎格罕氏岛[Lang2 ge2 han3 shi4 dao3]
